com.ikalagaming.core

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • com.ikalagaming.core.Console
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Console
extends java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
    A simple console.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Returns window width. This is the width of the frame the console is in.
        Returns:
        the width of the frame

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(int width)
        Sets the frame width. This is the width of the frame the console is in.
        Parameters:
        width - The new width

        Returns the window height. This is the height of the frame the console is in.
        Returns:
        the height of the frame

        Sets the frame height. This is the height of the frame the console is in.
        Parameters:

      • getMaxLineCount

        public int getMaxLineCount()
        Returns the maximum number of lines that are stored in the window.
        Returns:
        the max number of lines

      • setMaxLineCount

        public void setMaxLineCount(int maxLineCount)
        Sets the maximum number of lines stored in the window.
        Parameters:
        maxLineCount - the maximum number of lines to store

      • getWindowTitle

        public java.lang.String getWindowTitle()
        Returns the window title.
        Returns:
        the String that is used as the title

      • setWindowTitle

        public void setWindowTitle(java.lang.String windowTitle)
        Sets the title of the window.
        Parameters:
        windowTitle - the String to use as the title

      • appendMessage

        public void appendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Adds a String to the bottom of the console. Removes the top lines if/while they exceed the maximum line count.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to append
